text: Enter Laughing is a 1967 American comedy movie directed by first time director Carl Reiner and based on the autobiographical novel and play of the same name. It stars Jose Ferrer, Shelley Winters, Elaine May, Jack Gilford, Janet Margolin, Rob Reiner, Nancy Kovack, Michael J. Pollard, Don Rickles and was distributed by Columbia Pictures. ==Other websites== * Category:1967 comedy movies Category:American comedy movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies based on plays Category:Movies directed by Carl Reiner Category:Movies set in New York City Category:Columbia Pictures movies
title: Enter Laughing (movie)
